alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:49AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CATTARAUGUS AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1148 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of developing thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cuba to St. Bonaventure. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olean, Allegany, Cuba, St. Bonaventure, Weston Mills, Hinsdale, Friendship, Bolivar, Portville, Belmont, Angelica, Richburg, Knapp Creek, Rock City Park, Haskell Flats, West Clarksville, Black Creek, Little Genesee, and Ceres. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 25 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
